Legal_Issue: Whether there is a conflict of interest disqualifying plaintiffs' counsel from continuing to act
Procedural_Stage: Motion to dismiss based on disqualification of counsel
Evidence_Assessment: Information shared during 1990 consultation was public by 1993; no confidential information was disclosed
Legal_Rule: A lawyer cannot act against a former client in related matters unless confidential information was not imparted
Procedural_Issue: Disqualification of counsel due to alleged conflict of interest
Grounds_for_Claim: Plaintiffs' counsel previously consulted with defendant in 1990 regarding patent issues
Key_Evidence_Considered: Nature and confidentiality of information shared in 1990 consultation
Temporal distance between consultation and current case (1997)
Applicant_Challenge: Defendant challenged the continued representation by plaintiffs' counsel
Defendant_Response: Claimed conflict of interest due to prior consultation with plaintiffs' counsel
Governing_Rule: Ethical rule prohibiting representation adverse to former client where confidential information was disclosed
